# Systemd Receiver

<!-- end autogenerated section -->

The systemd receiver uses dbus to connect to locally running systemd daemon to retrieve metrics for configured units.


## Configuration

The following setting is mandatory:

* `units`: The list of units (fully specified i.e. `foo-bar.service`) to retrieve statistics for

The following settings are optional:

* `collection_interval` (default = `10s`)
* `initial_delay` (default = `1s`)
- `metrics` (defaults at [./documentation.md](./documentation.md)): Enables/disables individual metrics. See [./documentation.md](./documentation.md) for full detail.

Example:

```yaml
receivers:
  systemd:
    units:
      - foo.service
      - bar@quux.service
```
